markdown:
<title level="1" right="Rules">[Other Currency](/Rules.aspx?ID=2145)</title>

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 267 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Art objects, gems, and raw materials (such as those used for the Craft activity) can be used much like currency: you can sell them for the same Price you can buy them.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
name: Other Currency
